description._content: Image taken from: Title: "The Siege of Londonderry in 1689, as set forth in the literary remains of Col. the Rev. G. Walker, D.D., which are now first collected and comprise 1. A True Account of the Siege. 2. A Vindication of the True Account. 3. A Letter on the Treachery of Lundy. 4. Other official letters. 5. Sermons, prayers and speeches during the Siege. With notes original and selected ... and numerous illustrations. Edited by the Rev. P. Dwyer" Author: WALKER, George - D.D., Governor of Londonderry Contributor: DWYER, Philip. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9509.c.7." Page: 157 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1893 Publisher: Elliot Stock Issuance: monographic Identifier: 003835636 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
